question.title: JAVA_HOME is set to an invalid directory error in flutter
question.body: I have already tried everything other users did to solve the problem, but the error still shows up when I run the app: ERROR: JAVA_HOME is set to an invalid directory: /usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64/ however when I use the terminal on vs code this happens echo $JAVA_HOME /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk-24.jdk/Contents/Home Which is the right path and I don't know what's wrong. I've already tried editing the .zshrc and the .zprofile files on my macos.
